title: Add notes/comments display to VS Code extension editor
description: LLM agents need to see notes and comments they add while working on issues. The editor currently doesn't display the notes field that exists in the Issue type.

title: Implement multi-comment thread system for issues
description: Replace single notes string with proper comment thread supporting multiple timestamped comments with attribution. Enable agents and users to have conversations on issues with full history.

comments.author: developer
comments.content: Testing the new comment command from CLI

notes: Complete implementation of multi-comment thread system.

title: Update core types to support Comment interface
description: Add Comment interface with id, author, content, created_at. Change Issue.notes to Issue.comments array. Update types.ts in core package.

title: Add comment management functions to storage service
description: Add addComment(issueId, author, content) helper function to storage service. Handle comment ID generation with nanoid. Ensure atomic updates.

title: Update VS Code extension UI to display comment thread
description: Replace simple notes textarea with comment thread UI. Show chronological list of comments with author and timestamp. Add form to post new comments.

title: Update CLI to support adding comments
description: Add horizon comment command to CLI. Syntax: horizon comment <issue-id> <message>. Should detect if running in agent context vs user.

title: Add horizon_comment tool for LLM agents
description: Register new VS Code LM tool for agents to add comments. Should include issue ID and comment text as parameters. Auto-detect agent as author.
